short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Candidate navigation assistant for CPL / filters beta

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Merlin is an internal tool (account required) operating in tandem with CRM/ATS systems to enable rich artificial intelligence queries on top of existing ATS data: skills extraction and suggestions, profiles parsing, recruitment intelligence. It seamlessly integrates with Salesforce environments as a front-end add-on to streamline talent management processes within strictly siloed corporate boundaries. Internal tool developed by Opening.io for CPL Resources UK.
